column1: Why didnt the cashier get the punchline? it didnt register.
column3: The word register can mean to record or document something and it can also mean to understand or recognize something.
column4: The cashier needed to register the transaction for a sale.
column5: I didnt register the joke until someone explained it to me.

column1: Whats the best time to go to the dentist? tooth hurty!
column3: The word tooth refers to the hard structures in the mouth and can also refer to the pain associated with dental issues.
column4: I have a tooth that is aching and needs to be checked.
column5: The dentist says my tooth has a cavity that needs to be filled.

column1: Why would Koreans make great jazz musicians? because they have seoul.
column3: The word soul refers to the emotional essence of a person and is also a music genre.
column4: She poured her soul into the song she was singing.
column5: Jazz music often conveys the soul of its performers.

column1: What do ghosts do when theyre sad? they get in an elevator to lift their spirits.
column3: The word lift can mean to raise something physically and can also mean to elevate someones mood.
column4: Can you lift that box to the top shelf?
column5: I listen to music to lift my spirits when Im feeling down.
